DOC.brief_summary: This study determine whether drug bupropion effective treatment Pathological Gambling .
DOC.detailed_description: As gamble opportunity proliferate , PG become major health concern . Despite importance , treatment option prove efficacy exist . This study attempt identify effective treatment PG . Participants randomly assign receive either bupropion placebo 12 week . Participants assess baseline Weeks 2 , 3 , 4 , 5 , 6 , 8 , 10 , 12 . Self administer questionnaire interview use assess participant . Follow-up assessment make 1 , 3 , 6 month study completion .
DOC.criteria: Meet criterion Pathological Gambling ( DSMIVTR ) , administration National Opinion Research Center DSM Screen Gambling Problems ( NODS ) ; Meet criterion Pathological Gambling ( DSMIVTR ) , administration National Opinion Research Center DSM Screen Gambling Problems ( NODS ) ; Receive score 5 South Oaks Gambling Screen ( SOGS ) ; Have PG least one year ; Have least 2 gamble episode 2week screening period ; Speak standard English ; Be able give write informed consent . Evidence current ( past 3 month ) substance misuse ; Had Hamilton Depression Rating Scale ( HDRS ) 27 score 18 ( score item 1 great 2 ; Had current eating disorder ( except binge eat disorder ) ; Had history seizure , suicidal aggressive behavior ; Had urine drug screen positive stimulant , opiate , hallucinogen , phencyclidine ; Had current past psychotic disorder , bipolar disorder , significant cognitive disorder ; Received monoamine oxidase inhibitor within 3 week randomization , long act phenothiazine within 3 month randomization , fluoxetine within 4 week randomization , psychotropic drug within 2 week randomization ; Had prior exposure bupropion ; Were engage individual , group , couple psychotherapy 2 week randomization , ( except Gamblers Anonymous ) .
